cristal-den/happy-pills.title: TThhEe PPaRRtYY-Time Mint-Als
cristal-den/happy-pills.description:
Blue Flask cooks chemicals at the Violet Vial, an establishment located in the Red Light District of Crystal Den.

She's struggling on her improved recipe for Mint-Als. She'd like you to bring her a sample of the fabled Party-Time Mint-Als, so she can figure out how it was made. Do Party-Time Mint-Als even exist, or are they just a junkie's fever dream ?
cristal-den/happy-pills.desc-brought-sample: You brought the sample to Blue Flask, and she started working on the drug.
cristal-den/happy-pills.desc-help-cook: Using your keen chemistry knowledge, you provided some help to speed up the process.
cristal-den/happy-pills.desc-test: Blue Flask is done cooking. All that's left is to test its effect on a pony.
cristal-den/happy-pills.desc-test2: The test was conclusive. The drug is ready to hit the streets.
cristal-den/happy-pills.desc-guinea-pig: You kindly offered your own body for science, and tested the product yourself. What a trip !
cristal-den/happy-pills.fetch-sample: Find a sample of Party-Time Mint-Als
cristal-den/happy-pills.bring-sample: Give the sample to Blue Flask
cristal-den/happy-pills.test-batch: Have the the new batch tested
